statements.select: /* CommonDac.SelectCmmnCodeList 공통코드 조회 */ SELECT BSIS_CODE AS "BsisCode" ,BSIS_CODE_NM AS "BsisCodeNm" ,UPPER_CODE_ONE AS "UpperCodeOne" ,UPPER_CODE_TWO AS "UpperCodeTwo" ,UPPER_CODE_THREE AS "UpperCodeThree" FROM TN_CMMN_CODE WHERE UPPER_BSIS_CODE = #upperBsisCode# AND USE_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY BSIS_CODE

/* CommonDac.SelectOptCodeList 코드조회(base_codeT 테이블의 분류) */
Select CDCODE AS "cdCode" , CDNAME AS "cdName" From base_codeT WHERE CDINDEX = #cdIndex#
ORDER BY CDCODE
ORDER BY CDORDER

/* CommonDac.SelectCmmnCodeListByUpperCodeOne upperCodeOne 하위 공통코드 조회 */ SELECT BSIS_CODE AS "BsisCode" ,BSIS_CODE_NM AS "BsisCodeNm" FROM TN_CMMN_CODE WHERE UPPER_CODE_ONE = #UpperCodeOne# AND USE_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY BSIS_CODE

/* CommonDac.SelectCmmnCodeListByUpperCodeTwo upperCodeTwo 하위 공통코드 조회 */ SELECT BSIS_CODE AS "BsisCode" ,BSIS_CODE_NM AS "BsisCodeNm" FROM TN_CMMN_CODE WHERE UPPER_CODE_TWO = #UpperCodeTwo# AND USE_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY BSIS_CODE

/* CommonDac.SelectCmmnCodeListByUpperCodeThree upperCodeThree 하위 공통코드 조회 */ SELECT BSIS_CODE AS "BsisCode" ,BSIS_CODE_NM AS "BsisCodeNm" FROM TN_CMMN_CODE WHERE UPPER_CODE_THREE = #UpperCodeThree# AND USE_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY BSIS_CODE

/* CommonDac.SelectCmmnCodeByCmmnCodeNm 공통코드명 매핑 공통코드 조회 */ SELECT BSIS_CODE AS "BsisCode" FROM TN_CMMN_CODE WHERE UPPER_BSIS_CODE = #UpperBsisCode# AND BSIS_CODE_NM = #BsisCodeNm# AND USE_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY BSIS_CODE
